name.baseName: cement production;cement, portland cement;oxy-combustion CO2 capture
水泥生产;水泥, 硅酸盐水泥;氧气燃烧二氧化碳捕获

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Cement production with oxy-combustion carbon capture and storage (CCS).For oxy-combustion CO2 capture technology, fuel is burnt in almost pure oxygen rather than air. This requires an on-site ar separation unit (ASU) to deliver oxygen to the oxy-combustion process. The concentration of CO2 in the flue gas produced by oxy-combustion is higher (about 80 mol%, dryoasis) than that of post-combustion, so the flue gas can be transported and stored after a relativelsimple purification and compression processes instead of the separation process.
氧燃烧碳捕集与储存（oxy-combustion carbon capture and storage）的水泥生产。对于氧燃烧CO2捕集技术，燃料在几乎纯氧气而非空气中燃烧。这需要一个现场空气分离单元向氧燃烧过程提供氧气。氧燃烧产生的烟气中CO2的浓度较高（约80 mol％，干燥基），因此在相对简单的净化和压缩过程后，烟气可以被输送和储存，而无需进行分离过程。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: For oxy-combustion CO, capture technology, fuel is burnt in almost pure oxygen rather than airThis requires an on-site ar separation unit (ASU) to deliver oxygen to the oxy-combustion processThe concentration of CO, in the flue gas produced by oxy-combustion is higher (about 80 mol%, dryoasis) than that of post-combustion, so the flue gas can be transported and stored after a relativelsimple purification and compression processes instead of the separation process.

For oxy-combustion CO, capture technology, fuel is burnt in almost pure oxygen rather than airThis requires an on-site ar separation unit (ASU) to deliver oxygen to the oxy-combustion processThe concentration of CO, in the flue gas produced by oxy-combustion is higher (about 80 mol%, dryoasis) than that of post-combustion, so the flue gas can be transported and stored after a relativelsimple purification and compression processes instead of the separation process.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is for cement production using oxy-combustion CO2 capture and storage technology. This process is specifically implemented to produce Portland cement, a common type of cement used in the construction industry for various applications, such as in the making of concrete, mortar, stucco, and non-specialty grout.
本工艺描述的是使用氧燃烧CO2捕获与储存技术的水泥生产过程。该工艺专门用于生产硅酸盐水泥，这是建筑行业中常见的水泥类型，用于多种应用，如制作混凝土、砂浆、灰泥和非特种灌浆。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Jing An, Richard S. Middleton, & Yingnan Li. (2019). Environmental Performance Analysis of Cement Production with CO2 Capture and Storage Technology in a Life-Cycle Perspective. Sustainability 11, 2626.

Jing An, Richard S. Middleton, & Yingnan Li. (2019). Environmental Performance Analysis of Cement Production with CO2 Capture and Storage Technology in a Life-Cycle Perspective. Sustainability 11, 2626.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The production capacity is set to produce 1 million tons of cement per year, with the proportion of clinker in cement products being 91%.
生产能力设定为每年生产1百万吨水泥，水泥产品中熟料的比例为91%。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, ensure that the environmental impacts of the on-site air separation unit (ASU) and the relatively simple purification and compression processes for flue gas are included. Consider the high CO2 concentration caused by oxy-combustion and adjust the system boundary to include the transportation and storage of captured CO2. This data is based on a production capacity of 1 million tons of cement annually, with a clinker proportion of 91% in cement products.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，确保包括现场空气分离单元（ASU）以及烟气的相对简单净化和压缩过程的环境影响。考虑到氧燃烧造成的高CO2浓度，调整系统边界以包括捕获CO2的运输和存储。此数据基于每年1百万吨水泥的生产能力，水泥产品中熟料比例为91%。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Coal. Data taken from the technical report, IEA Greenhous Gas R&D Programme (IEA GHG). CO2 Capture in the Cement Industry. 2008. Available online: http://documents.ieaghg.org/index.php/s/YKm6B7zikUpPgGA?path=%2F2008 (accessed on 5 September 2017).
